statements: UPDATE PredictiveModels SET model_name='Logistic Regression', algorithm_used='LR', last_trained_date='2022-01-15' WHERE model_id=1;
UPDATE PredictiveModels SET model_type='Decision Tree', training_data_table='employee_data', last_trained_date='2022-02-20', algorithm_used='DT' WHERE model_id=2;
UPDATE PredictiveModels SET last_trained_date = '2022-01-10' WHERE model_id = 1;
UPDATE PredictiveModels SET algorithm_used = 'Random Forest', model_name = 'RFModel' WHERE model_id = 3;
UPDATE building_predictions SET prediction_result = true WHERE prediction_id = 12345;
UPDATE machine_learning_algorithms SET description = 'An advanced algorithm for data analysis.' WHERE algorithm_id = 7;
UPDATE building_predictions SET prediction_result = TRUE, model_name = 'Linear Regression' WHERE prediction_id = 1;

UPDATE machine_learning_algorithms SET description = 'Support Vector Machines (SVM) algorithm is a supervised machine learning algorithm that is used for classification and regression tasks.' WHERE algorithm_id = 2;
UPDATE models SET model_name = 'New Model' WHERE model_id = 1;
UPDATE datasets SET dataset_name = 'New Dataset', file_path = '/path/to/new_file.csv' WHERE dataset_id = 2;
UPDATE models SET model_name='New Model Name', created_at='2021-10-15 09:30:00' WHERE model_id=1;
UPDATE predictions SET prediction_result='Success', prediction_timestamp='2021-10-15 10:45:00' WHERE model_id=2 AND dataset_id=1;
UPDATE building_data SET area_sqft = 2000 WHERE building_id = 1;
UPDATE predictive_model SET accuracy = 0.85 WHERE model_id = 2;
UPDATE building_data SET area_sqft = 5000, year_built = 2000 WHERE building_id = 1;
UPDATE predictive_model SET accuracy = 0.95, algorithm = 'Random Forest' WHERE model_id = 2;
UPDATE ModelDataSet SET dataset_description='Updated description' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE ModelResults SET result_metrics='Updated metrics' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE ModelDataSet SET dataset_size = 500 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE ModelParameters SET param_value = 0.75 WHERE model_id = 3 AND param_name = 'learning_rate'
